articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nnnnicholas ⛱
Showing off a lil onchain svg code at 11:30am est at @developer_dao’s @devntellxyz. https://twitter.com/devntellxyz/status/1629134054825009155

DevNTell: During todays #DevNTell @nnnnicholas will demo his contracts rendering live @juiceboxETH treasury data to onchain SVG NFTs, explain how the code works, and share template repos so you can get started making onchain SVGs in less than a minute! 
Sign up 👉 https://lu.ma/8gmo97go
articles.title: RT nnnnicholas ⛱: Showing off a lil onchain svg code at 11:30am est at @developer_dao’s @devntellxyz. https://twitter.com/devntellxyz/status/1629134...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT tonyolendo.eth
When I see paid testnets, what you're saying is you don't care about the global South. No one in the decision room knows what it means to not have a credit card, to pay a week's wages on gas fees, to have your access to USD limited due to forex controls and Western blacklisting https://twitter.com/PatrickAlphaC/status/1628504862890549249

Patrick Collins 🌪: I think this summaries my stance on paid testnets. https://twitter.com/PatrickAlphaC/status/1628504282700910592
